sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS0360 ( DPOB_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dtilOccuInttnCd# , #typOccuCd# , #deptCd# , #payrMangDeptCd# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS0360 SET PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# AND TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS0360 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# AND TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS0360 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# AND TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# AND DEPT_CD=#deptCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , DEPT_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS0360 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD DESC , TYP_OCCU_CD DESC , DEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0360 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DEPT_CD,C.TYP_OCCU_CD,C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(C.DPOB_CD,C.DEPT_CD, 2) AS DEPT_NM_RTCHNT, fcBass0320CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD) AS DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN , C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 SS WHERE SS.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND SS.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ) AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0360 C, BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
C.DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
AND C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0360 C , BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
C.DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DEPT_CD,C.TYP_OCCU_CD,C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(C.DPOB_CD,C.DEPT_CD, 2) AS DEPT_NM_RTCHNT, fcBass0320CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD) AS DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN , C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 SS WHERE SS.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND SS.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ) AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0360 C, BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
C.DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
AND NVL(C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'TT') = 'TT' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT E.DPOB_CD, E.DEPT_CD,E.TYP_OCCU_CD,E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD FROM SYSM0700 E WHERE E.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND E.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND E.TYP_OCCU_CD = C.TYP_OCCU_CD AND E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD )
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0360 C , BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
C.DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
AND NVL(C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'TT') = 'TT' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT E.DPOB_CD, E.DEPT_CD,E.TYP_OCCU_CD,E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD FROM SYSM0700 E WHERE E.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND E.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND E.TYP_OCCU_CD = C.TYP_OCCU_CD AND E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DEPT_CD,C.TYP_OCCU_CD,C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(C.DPOB_CD,C.DEPT_CD, 2) AS DEPT_NM_RTCHNT, fcBass0320CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD) AS DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN , C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 SS WHERE SS.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND SS.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ) AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0360 C, BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
D.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
AND NVL(C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'TT') = 'TT' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT E.DPOB_CD, E.DEPT_CD,E.TYP_OCCU_CD,E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD FROM SYSM0700 E WHERE E.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND E.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND E.TYP_OCCU_CD = C.TYP_OCCU_CD AND E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND E.USR_ID = #usrId# )
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0360 C , BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
D.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
AND NVL(C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD,'TT') = 'TT' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT E.DPOB_CD, E.DEPT_CD,E.TYP_OCCU_CD,E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD FROM SYSM0700 E WHERE E.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND E.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD AND E.TYP_OCCU_CD = C.TYP_OCCU_CD AND E.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND E.USR_ID = #usrId# )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DEPT_CD,C.TYP_OCCU_CD,C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(C.DPOB_CD,C.DEPT_CD, 2) AS DEPT_NM_RTCHNT, fcBass0320CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD, fcBass0320CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD) AS DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN FROM BASS0360 C, BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD(+) AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD(+) AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD(+) AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0360 C , BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD(+) AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD(+) AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD(+) AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DEPT_CD,C.TYP_OCCU_CD,C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(C.DPOB_CD,C.DEPT_CD, 2) AS DEPT_NM_RTCHNT, fcBass0320CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, D.DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_CD) AS DTIL_OCCU_JBFML_DIV_NM, D.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_USE_YN , C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 SS WHERE SS.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND SS.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ) AS PAYR_MANG_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0360 C, BASS0350 D WHERE C.DPOB_CD = D.DPOB_CD AND C.TYP_OCCU_CD = D.TYP_OCCU_CD AND C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD =D.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND C.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
C.DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
AND C.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
fcBassEx0350CDNM(C.DPOB_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, 1) like '%' || #dtilOccuClsNm# || '%'
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
